title: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition
notes: Crashes as soon as the splash screen shows.

title: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition
notes: Need proton parameter PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command% --  graphic bug in select airplane in the free flight menu and in menu inside of game.

title: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition
notes: The game seems stable, but there are many graphical bugs in the window to choose the flight settings, especially when loading the 3D model of the aircraft. I/O uses very high amount of CPU (23%), loading times are very high, performance is worse than on Windows.

title: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition
notes: The game itself works but there are graphics glitches in the flight selection menus as well as the in game menus including font errors. It is somewhat playable if you know what the menus do.

title: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition
notes: Required launch options "PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command%" (minus quotes). Window and right-click menu does not show options.

title: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition
notes: Launches main menu, crashes when trying to start a flight. Always runs "completing setup" when trying to start the game.
